revision.text: {{also|yídloh}} ==Navajo== ===Etymology=== {{nv-prefixes|yi-prog|3s|d}} {{nv-link-to-stem|-dloh|progressive}} {{nv-link-to-root|-DLOʼ|laugh}}. ===Verb=== {{head|nv|verb}} # he is [[smile|smiling]], [[laugh]]ing, [[giggle|giggling]] #:{{ux|nv|[[áko]] [[nizhónígo]] yídloh doo|so you will have a beautiful smile}} ====Usage notes==== This is a progressive verb; it is conjugated only in the progressive mode. ====Conjugation==== {{nv-paradigm|progressive|yi}}. {{nv-verbtable|PROGRESSIVE |yishdloh|yiidloh|deíníidlóóh|yídloh|wohdloh|deínóhdlóóh|yidloh|deídlóóh|joodloh|dajídlóóh}}
